00017 void ChatViewTest::addTest()
00018 {
00019     QScopedPointer<Aki::ChatView> view(new Aki::ChatView);
00020     const Aki::Irc::NickInfo self(QLatin1String("zeke!~zeke@unaffiliated/zeke"));
00021     const Aki::Irc::NickInfo sender(QLatin1String("comawhite!~coma@unaffiliated/comawhite"));
00022
